body: STFU THIS IS FUCKING TRASH MOTHERFUCKER
you are right! Pope Francis! you are absolutely right! you always right!!!!
Im still waiting for part 2 of this. I just love this. This is perfection.

Vanilla lovers be like my friend Tom. Tom is a vanilla fan but hates NTR. But Tom here has a friend named Roger. Roger here loves NTR, but when Tom found out he still supported Roger because in the end. They're homies and homies don't shit on eachother just because of their tastes. So let this be a lesson to all of you vanilla lovers and NTR lovers, don't be a dick...because we are all degenerates in the end.

@tobajas the series has already ended actually, and it's just an anticlimactic reveal where the app creator, who is one of his female colleauges, is just using him for her experiments and opted to remove him from the equation when his actions threatens the secrecy of her app. He's apparently also under the app's hypnosis too.

Would be nice to for once see what actually happens to the guy doing the hypnosis. I mean the setting here is that he's a counselor at a prestigous school if I remember correctly and the girls are starting to turn up pregnant. I mean usually the story just ends with the dude having a harem at the school and just keeps doing it but would be nice to actually see their family react though most likely if the author added that part it usually goes as one of the moms going alone to investigate and then they get hypnotized and turned into sex slaves as well.
Well that was some big mental gymnastics she did right there to arrive to that silly conclusion hahahahah lmao
"I can't restore your hymen tho" lol
